attributes.review: This app took an astronomical amount of hours to download, only to prompt me with a question asking if it could send me spam notifications! They then ask you for private information which they are probably selling to the Chinese government. The mustâ€™ve built this app for the Iphone 3gs because itâ€™s slower than my grandmas android. Someone please help!!!!!
